contexts.context: The following example treats the short numbered <mark>clauses</mark> of Anglo-Saxon legal codes as lists of...
...indicated by the two-level numbering of the <mark>clauses</mark>. The clauses could have been treated as a...
...two-level numbering of the clauses. The <mark>clauses</mark> could have been treated as a one-level...
...convention requires that this be expressed as a finite <mark>clause</mark>, begining with an active verb.
